official_title: A bill to amend the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended, to provide for statutory creation of the Office of Inspection and Enforcement of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to establish an Office of Inspection and Enforcement within the Nuclear Regulatory Commission. Requires the Office to perform functions delegated by the Commission including principal inspection, investigation, and enforcement involving all facilities and materials licensed or regulated by the Commission. Directs the Office to recommend research necessary for the discharge of Commission functions.
